postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Up For Paws Dog Daycare is looking for a full-time dog daycare assistant who wants an exciting career in the force-free dog service industry! 
 
Safety of dogs and staff are our highest priority. We practice force-free dog training techniques at Up For Paws. 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
- Stay in the dog daycare center as live-in manager to attend to daycare and boarding dogs. A comfortable room, bed and amenities will be provided. Expected workweek of 5.5 days a week with 1 day off.  
- Handle all dogs gently with force-free techniques (training will be provided) 
- To be trustworthy and honest at ALL times 
- To complete daily duties assigned including: cleaning of shop, keeping the shop clean and tidy, dog walking, dog bathing, feeding of meals etc. 
 
Requirements: 
 
1. Must love dogs, must have taken care of dogs before 
2. Dog training will be provided 
3. Preferable: Class 3 driver license 
4. ONLY HIRING: Singaporean, PR or Malaysian 
 
Qualified or interested candidates, please reply now with the following information! 
 
1. Personal Particulars: Name (as in NRIC/FIN), Address, Contact Number 
3. Education background 
3. Work experience - pet related 
4. Current/Last and Expected Salary 
5. Date of availability / notice period 
 
If you are shortlisted we will email you and request for a resume. We will only contact shortlisted prospects. Thank you for understanding.
title: Dog Daycare Shop Assistant (Live in)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Up For Paws Dog Daycare is looking for a full-time dog daycare assistant who wants an exciting career in the force-free dog service industry! 
 
Safety of dogs and staff are our highest priority. We practice force-free dog training techniques at Up For Paws. 
 
Role and Responsibilities: 
- Supervision of dog Playgroups 
- General dog care: Bathing, Feeding, Walking 
- Force-free dog training and communication with dogs 
- Cleaning and tidying of daycare facility daily 
- Communicate and update clients 
- Communicate with management and teammates 
 
Experience: 
- Have taken care of dogs before 
- Responsible 
- Self motivated 
- Honest and reliable 
- Willing to learn (we will send you to Canine first aid and Positive training courses) 
- Driver's license a plus 
- Previous Force free/positive training experience a plus 
 
Job Details: 40-45 hours per week (Starting salary $1100 - $2000 depending on experience) 
 
Please reply with a short answer to the following questions: 
1. Why would you be a value to our team? 
2. What motivates you most about this work? 
3. Why would you like to join Up For Paws?  
 
If you are shortlisted we will email you and request for a resume. We will only contact shortlisted prospects. Thank you for understanding.
title: Dog Daycare Shop Assistant (Full Time)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Responsibilities 
•	Wash dishes, glassware, flatware, pots, and/or pans using dishwashers or by hand. 
•	Operating dish machines  
•	Using proper measurements of detergent and sanitizer in the dish machine 
•	Ensures dishes and cookware are sanitized and available as needed. 
•	Trouble-shoot dishwasher machine malfunctions. 
•	Maintains daily cleanliness and maintenance of dish machine. 
•	Follow our safety and sanitation policy at all times 
•	Keeps immediate supervisor promptly and fully informed of all problems or unusual matters of significance and takes prompt corrective action when necessary or suggests alternative courses of action which may be taken. 
•	Performs all duties and responsibilities in a timely and effective manner in accordance with established company policies to achieve the overall objectives of the position. 
•	Maintains a favorable working relationship with all team members to foster and promote a cooperative and harmonious working climate, which will be conducive to maximize team member morale, productivity, efficiency and effectiveness. 
 
Requirements 
•	Must be able to frequently immerse hands in water 
•	Must follow handling and sanitation procedures and use extreme caution with utensils, plateware, glassware and equipment to avoid breakage. 
•	Must be able to frequently bend and stoop 
•	Must be able to work frequently in a hot and damp environment
title: Dishwasher

We are a family of three (two working adults and a teenage son) living in a terrace house, looking for an experience, who knows the job and its requirements, independent, trustworthy and hard-working helper. Sri Lankan maids are most welcome and must have completed at least 2 years contract with current employer or any other. 
 
She should be experienced in running a household and tasks include cooking Indian Veg food (including menu planning for the week), cleaning, laundry, ironing, washing car, marketing and be able to organize her daily work independently.  
 
Honesty and reliability is a must, a person between 33-45 years of age with a friendly but adaptable style would be great. Able to commit for 2 year contract, salary to commensurate experience, 2 or 4 off days. Prefer those who currently working in landed houses and their contract going to expire towards the end of the year. 
 
Looking to hear from you. Please email at 
  show contact info 
 
PS: No agents (no faith) 
Best regards,
